knimeNode.name: XML To Table
knimeNode.shortDescription: Transforms parameters in the XML cells to one parameter per column

fullDescription.intro: Transforms parameters in the XML cells to one parameter per column and adds these columns to the end of the table in the outport.
fullDescription.option: Select the XML column which contains the needed parameters. In order to transform the content of more than one XML column place several "XML 2 Table" nodes one after another.
Check this box to append the XML parameters to the outport table.

option.name: Cols from XML 2 add to table

fullDescription.option: Choose the XML parameters to be added to the outport table. To choose two or more XML parameters press Ctrl or Shift and then click.

ports.inPort: Put this node anyhwere in the workflow where there are parameters in XML columns in the outport.
ports.outPort: Models/data plus additional parameters from XML columns.
